Title: The Complete Pokémon Dataset
Creator: Rounak Banik
Description: Information on all 802 Pokémon from all 7 generation of Pokémon so far. The dataset include base stats, height weight, classfication, egg steps, experience, abilities, etc. The information was scraped from http://serebii.net/
Subject: Pokémon
